definitions.definition: Coming before in order or time ; earlier , former , previous .
examples: His prior residence was smaller than his current one.
I had no prior knowledge you were coming.

definitions.definition: Chiefly in prior probability : of the probability of an event : determined without knowledge of the occurrence of other events that bear on it, before additional data is collected .

main_definition: Coming before in order or time ; earlier , former , previous .
secondary_definitions: ( Bayesian statistics ) Chiefly in prior probability : of the probability of an event : determined without knowledge of the occurrence of other events that bear on it, before additional data is collected .
